page.title: 13La Rocco Tower (2)
page.content:
The tower was nearly collapsing by the mid 1960s and there was much public concern that this landmark would not only be lost but that the stone debris from it would become scattered across the sandy beach. In the late 1960s a special offer was made by{Ronez quarries}to repair the damage using their new concrete pumping system. The total cost was to be Â£34000.00.
The{States of Jersey}agreed to pay Â£17000.00 if the rest were raised by public subscription. In the event the appeal committee that was set up to raise the money from the public succeeded in the remarkably short time to{100 days. }
